name: Spread the Love (Joe E. Measles)
description:
Spread the Love

I took the theme of "Joined Together" as Joining Together ammo and health in a 2-D action platformer type game.

You play as a love mage in his home, which is overrun by various monsters. You have to use your love magic to pacify them,  but if you run out of love magic you will be too sad to go on. 

It's an endless game that gets harder.  I had to make a lot of compromises and refuse overscoping due to the time limit but I think it's fun and has promise.
Hope you enjoy!
Warning it's not easy.

All Music and Art done by yours truly.
